title: Revenge is Sweet
description: Lauren Davies is a BBW and has a great job at the Sinclair Advertising Agency. She recently broke up with her long-time boyfriend and just wants t work and move on. Janet and Susan are two young women in the office that tease her constantly about her lack of dates. When her boss Craig Sinclair offers to take her out to dinner to thank her for her hard work in the office, will her luck change? Will Lauren get back at the girls for treating her so poorly? This is an erotic short story romance. Contains sexual themes.
author: J.D. Anders
